creator: bob.stone@hp.com
text:
In Xindice.java PROP_XINDICE_CONFIGURATION is defined as xindice.configuration. 
That constant is used throughout the codebase(Xindice.java, XMLTools.java, 
DatabaseImpl.java). However in XindiceServlet.java(L242) and web.xml it is 
hardcoded as xindice-configuration. This already caused problem in one of the 
builds, however xindice.configuration in XindiceServlet was reset back to 
xindice-configuration. Shouldn't this to be used instead:

XindiceServlet.java(L242):    String path = config.getInitParameter( 
Xindice.PROP_XINDICE_CONFIGURATION );

creator: Kevin.Ross@iVerticalLeap.com
text:
This was already that way in cvs, but...the web.xml was wrong.  Check it out, 
it works for me.  Thank you
